alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Wabash; Wayne (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wayne, Wabash, Edwards, Gibson and Pike Counties through 1230 AM CDT/130 AM EDT/... At 1144 PM CDT/1244 AM EDT/, a line of showers was producing strong wind gusts thunderstorms along a line extending from near Washington to near Parkersburg. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph have been measured with this line. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Carmel and Owensville. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 28 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
